title: Train service disruption due to defective 3rd rail

title_translations.zh-Hans: 第三轨故障导致火车服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kereta api kerana rel ke-3 yang rosak
title_translations.ta: குறைபாடுள்ள 3வது ரயில் காரணமாக ரயில் சேவை தடங்கல்

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Free bus service from #Tampines to #TanahMerah has ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train service from #Tampines towards #TanahMerah is now running normally.
[EWL]:No train service from #Tampines to #TanahMerah towards JooKoon due to defective 3rd rail. Power supply shut down for 30min.
